info.title: NZBN V4 REST API (design version 1.36)
info.description: Interact with the New Zealand Business Number (NZBN) register.

get.description: Search for an entity by name.
get.summary: NZBN_001_1 - Search the NZBN directory by name (text search)

parameters.name: search-term
parameters.description: The text string to search for. Free-text search searches across current and past entity names, current and past trading names, NZBN and legacy numbers (eg company number).

parameters.name: entity-status
parameters.description: Entity status search filter element (one or more of Registered, VoluntaryAdministration, InReceivership, InLiquidation, InStatutoryAdministration,Inactive,RemovedClosed)

parameters.name: entity-type
parameters.description: Entity type search filter element (one or more of NZCompany,OverseasCompany, SoleTrader, Partnership, Trust, BuildingSociety, CharitableTrust, CreditUnion, FriendlySociety, IncorporatedSociety, IndustrialAndProvidentSociety, LimitedPartnershipNz, LimitedPartnershipOverseas, SpecialBodies, SpecialBody, Trading_Trust, Sole_Trader, B, I, D, F, N, S, T, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtEdu, GovtLocal, GovtOther, LTD, ULTD, COOP,ASIC, NON_ASIC

parameters.name: industry-code
parameters.description: Industry code search filter element

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of search records page (for pagination), zero indexed

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Number of search records to be returned (for pagination)

200.description: Returns a search result array of entities. Results are sorted by relevance.

post.summary: Create a new NZBN entity - one of sole-trader, partnership, trust
post.description: Create an NZBN entity - one of sole trader, partnership, trust.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Entity that needs to be added

get.description: Get an NZBN Entity

parameters.name: nzbn
parameters.description: NZBN entity to get details for

get.description: Get an NZBN Entity
get.summary: NZBN_002 - Get basic details of a specified NZBN entity and links to additional information.

parameters.name: nzbn
parameters.description: NZBN entity to get details for

get.description: Search for NZBN entities based on change history.

parameters.name: change-event-type
parameters.description:
A comma separated list of change events to match when searching the change history
ALL,
NEW,
ENTITY,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_STATUS,
ADDRESSES_REGISTERED,
ADDRESSES_OFFICE,
ADDRESSES_POSTAL,
ADDRESSES_RECORDS,
ADDRESSES_SHAREREGISTER,
ADDRESSES_INVOICE,
ADDRESSES_DELIVERY,
ADDRESSES_SERVICE,
COMPANYDETAILS_FRAFILINGMONTH,
COMPANYDETAILS_ARFILINGMONTH,
COMPANYDETAILS_CONSTITUTIONFILED,
COMPANYDETAILS_COUNTRYOFORIGIN,
COMPANYDETAILS_NZSXCODE,
COMPANYDETAILS_ACNNUMBER,
COMPANYDETAILS_ULTIMATEHOLDINGCOMPANY,
COMPANYDETAILS_SHAREHOLDING,
COMPANYDETAILS_INSOLVENCYDETAILS,
COMPANYDETAILS_FILINGS, 
COMPANYDETAILS_REMOVALCOMMENCED,  
COMPANYDETAILS_ANNUALRETURNS,
COMPANYDETAILS_FINANCIALSTATEMENTS,          
ROLES_DIRECTOR,
ROLES_SOLETRADER,
ROLES_TRUSTEE_INDIVIDUAL,
ROLES_PARTNER_INDIVIDUAL,
ROLES_TRUSTEE_OTHER,
ROLES_PARTNER_OTHER,
ROLES_PARTNER_GENERAL_PARTNER,
ROLES_PERSONAUTHORISEDFORSERVICE,
PRIVACYSETTINGS,
TRADINGNAMES,
WEBSITES,
PHONENUMBERS,
EMAILADDRESSES,
GSTNUMBER,
TRADINGAREAS,
AUSTRALIANBUSINESSNUMBER,
INDUSTRYCLASSIFICATIONS,
BUSINESSETHNICITYIDENTIFIER

parameters.name: entity-type
parameters.description: Entity type search filter element (one or more of Trading_Trust, Sole_Trader, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtEdu, GovtLocal, GovtOther, LTD, ULTD, COOP,ASIC, NON_ASIC

parameters.name: date-time-from
parameters.description: Start date for change history search (format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

parameters.name: date-time-to
parameters.description: End date for change history search (format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of search records page (for pagination), zero indexed

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Number of search records to be returned (for pagination)

parameters.name: sort-by
parameters.description: Parameter by which to sort the search results.

parameters.name: sort-order
parameters.description: API Consumer can specify "ASC" or "DESC" to sort by the attribute specified in the sortBy parameter.   ASC will sort in ascending order, DESC will sort in descending order.

200.description: Returns a search result array of entities. Results are sorted by relevance.

get.description: Get the details of the currently logged in user (the only user resource the current user has authorisation to see)
get.summary: NZBN_101_1 - Get the details of the currently logged in user

post.description: Allows a first-time user, logged in via RealMe, to create an NZBN profile to match it.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: User to be added

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

get.description: Get User Details

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to return

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to update

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: UUID / ETag for concurrency control

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: User to be updated

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Date modified for concurrency control, in the format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS, e.g 2016-10-21T11:21:33.224

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

get.description: Search for organisations that the current user is a member or administrator of.  There are no search parameters - this call returns every organisation associated with the current user.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since

parameters.description: Date modified for concurrency control, in the format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS, e.g 2016-10-21T11:21:33.224

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

get.description: This will return authorities for given nzbn, user, organisation and can filter on status, e.g. PENDING.  Can specify one of nzbn, user-id, organisation-id, approver-user-id. Can further refine by specifying authority-status.

parameters.name: nzbn
parameters.description: Return all authorities relevant to this entity.  The nzbn can be provided along with other parameters to test if a given user, organisation, or approver has an authority relevant to this entity

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: return all authorities relevant to this user - whether allocated personally or allocated to an organisation this user is a member of

parameters.name: organisation-id
parameters.description: Returns all authorities relevant to this Organisation

parameters.name: historic
parameters.description: if False (default), return only authorities that are current (not historic); granted (not revoked or pending); and for current entities (not removed ones). If True, return all current, pending, revoked and historic authorities.

parameters.name: authority-status
parameters.description: Authority Status to restrict results to

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of search records page (for pagination), zero indexed

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Number of search records to be returned (for pagination)

parameters.name: sort-by
parameters.description: Name of the field to sort the response by

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Whether to sort the response in ascending or descending order

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

post.description: Request an Authority. Only available for The following Entity Types  400 error returned if called for an entity that is not a Company.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Authority being requested. Only nzbn, authorityType, reason, comment, and one of userId or organisationId are to be populated.

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

put.description: Accept or reject an authority request. Only applicable for updating authorityStatus from PENDING, to ACCEPTED or REJECTED.  400 error returned otherwise. Usual concurrency headers not used because of the restricted nature of this PUT.

parameters.name: authorityId
parameters.description: Authority ID to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Authority to be updated. Only authorityStatus, reason, comment, and nzbn are to be edited.

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

post.description: Upload a document for verification purposes. Either 200 or 201 will be returned for successful uploads. Three-legged token required.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: UUID / ETag for concurrency control

parameters.name: documentForUpload
parameters.description: The document for upload. (filename must be specified in the Content-Disposition.)

parameters.name: entityTypeCode
parameters.description: The type of entity for which the document is being submitted for. One of LTD, ULTD, COOP, ASIC, NON_ASIC, Sole_Trader, Partnership or Trading_Trust

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Date modified for concurrency control, in the format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS, e.g 2016-10-21T11:21:33.224

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Watchlist ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Watchlist to be added

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Watchlist ID

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

get.description: Using the Watchlist Id, request the NZBN List associated with the watchlist.  The response will display all the NZBNs associated with the watchlist, where there are any.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Watchlist ID

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

get.description: Searches existing watchlists; returns all watchlists that can be managed by the current user, if no parameters are passed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Optional, allows entry of a text string.  The search will attempt to match on watchlists where watchlist name contains the input string, for the currently authenticated user

parameters.name: organisation-id
parameters.description: Optional, If blank this is a personal watchlist. If completed this is an organisation’s watchlist and can be managed by any administrator of this organisation.  If entered; must be a valid Organisation Id for the NZBN system and one that the user is a member of. The search will return records only where an exact match is found.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of search records page (for pagination), zero indexed

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: Number of search records to be returned (for pagination)

parameters.name: sort-by
parameters.description: Name of the field to sort the response by

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Whether to sort the response in ascending or descending order

parameters.name: change-event-types
parameters.description: A change event type to match when receiving the change history in a notification. One or more change event type(s) to match with when specifying conditions for notifications in "Create New Watchlist".  List of comma separated values.

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

post.description: Create a new watchlist to receive notification of data changes to NZBN entities.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Watchlist to be added

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

post.description: Add one or more NZBNs to the set of NZBNs being watched by an existing watchlist.  This use case does not remove any of the previously specified NZBNs from the watchlist.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Watchlist ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Watchlist to be added

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

post.description: Remove one or more NZBNs from the set of NZBNs being watched by an existing watchlist.

parameters.name: watchlistId
parameters.description: Watchlist ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Watchlist to be added

parameters.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
parameters.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

post.description: Sends a single test notification to the target endpoint or email address specified in the watchlist

parameters.name: watchlistId

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Watchlist to be added

DocumentFiling.title: DocumentFiling
DocumentFiling.description: Document filing information required to submit a filing for an already uploaded document

documentId.description: This is the documentId returned by a successful /documents POST operation

DocumentFilingResponse.title: DocumentFilingResponse
DocumentFilingResponse.description: The filing information to be returned on successful completion of a Filing

documentId.description: This is the documentId returned by a successful /documents POST operation

DocumentType.title: DocumentType
DocumentType.description: Enum of possible document types that can be posted. One of BDHNOTICE, BDHNOTAPPR,BDHDECDECL, BDHEXTENS, BDHCANCELL

HibernationStatus.title: HibernationStatus
HibernationStatus.description: The current and historical codes that identify the business entity's Business Debt Hibernation status.

startDate.description: The date this entity status code applied from.

endDate.description: The date this entity status code no longer applied

entityStatusCode.description: A code that identifies the business entity's current trading status, during formation, operation, and voluntary or involuntary winding up.  A full list is available on the API explorer website. Not required for POST.

entityName.description: The current registered name of the business entity, which may differ from its trading name(s) and historic entity names.  For sole traders the entity name is a concatenation of First, Middle and Last Names recorded in the sole trader role entry. Not required for POST.

nzbn.description: The 13 digit unique identifier of a New Zealand business entity. Not required for POST.

entityTypeCode.description: Entity type code. One of LTD, ULTD, COOP, ASIC, NON_ASIC, Sole_Trader, Partnership, Trading_Trust, B, I, D, F, N, S, T, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtLocal, GovtEdu, GovtOther

entityTypeDescription.description: One of NZ Limited Company, NZ Unlimited Company, NZ Co-operative Company, Overseas ASIC Company, Overseas Non-ASIC Company, Sole Trader, Partnership, Trust, Building Society, Incorporated Society, Credit Union , Friendly Society, Industrial & Provident Society, Special Body, Charitable Trust, Limited Partnership (NZ), Limited Partnership (Overseas), Central Government, Local Government, Education, Other Public Entity

entityStatusDescription.description: The description of the business entity's trading status, e.g. showing registered or in voluntary or involuntary winding up. Not required for POST.

registrationDate.description: Records the date that the entity was registered. For entities that must register. For entities that must be registered on an entity register, this is the date the entity begins to exist. For other entities that may choose to register, this is the date the entity was recorded in the register. For these entities, the registered date may be the same as or after the start date. Optional for POST, defaults to current date.

sourceRegister.description: Register where entity detail is mastered. One of COMPANY, Sole_Trader, Partnership, Trading_Trust,  B, I, D, F, N, S, T, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtLocal, GovtEdu, GovtOther

sourceRegisterUniqueIdentifier.description: Entity identifier held in register for example Company Number. Not required for POST.

lastUpdatedDate.description: The last time the entity was updated

australianBusinessNumber.description: Applicable to Companies and Overseas Companies domiciled in Australia. ABN is a unique eleven digit number that identifies a business or organisation that is operating in Australia. It is not compulsory in Australia to have an ABN and not everyone is entitled to one.

addresses.description: Collection of all Addresses relevant to the NZBN

industryClassifications.description: The Business Industry Classification of the nature of work of the business entity

phoneNumbers.description: The current phone contact numbers of a business entity.

websites.description: The websites of a business entity.

tradingNames.description: The trading names of a business entity.

roles.description: A collection of the persons and business entities that are directors, trustees, partners, officers or comparable roles in the business entity.

NonCompany.title: NonCompany
NonCompany.description: Public information about a non Company entity, for example a Limited Partnership / Charity, that is in addition to Primary Business data.

entityStatusCode.description: A code that identifies the business entity's current trading status, during formation, operation, and voluntary or involuntary winding up.  A full list is available on the API explorer website. Not required for POST.

entityName.description: The current registered name of the business entity, which may differ from its trading name(s) and historic entity names.  For sole traders the entity name is a concatenation of First, Middle and Last Names recorded in the sole trader role entry. Not required for POST.

nzbn.description: The 13 digit unique identifier of a New Zealand business entity. Not required for POST.

entityTypeCode.description: Entity type code. One of LTD, ULTD, COOP, ASIC, NON_ASIC, Sole_Trader, Partnership, Trading_Trust, B, I, D, F, N, S, T, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtLocal, GovtEdu, GovtOther

entityTypeDescription.description: One of NZ Limited Company, NZ Unlimited Company, NZ Co-operative Company, Overseas ASIC Company, Overseas Non-ASIC Company, Sole Trader, Partnership, Trust, Building Society, Incorporated Society, Credit Union , Friendly Society, Industrial & Provident Society, Special Body, Charitable Trust, Limited Partnership (NZ), Limited Partnership (Overseas), Central Government, Local Government, Education, Other Public Entity

entityStatusDescription.description: The description of the business entity's trading status, e.g. showing registered or in voluntary or involuntary winding up. Not required for POST.

registrationDate.description: Records the date that the entity was registered. For entities that must register. For entities that must be registered on an entity register, this is the date the entity begins to exist. For other entities that may choose to register, this is the date the entity was recorded in the register. For these entities, the registered date may be the same as or after the start date. Optional for POST, defaults to current date.

sourceRegister.description: Register where entity detail is mastered.One of COMPANY, Sole_Trader, Partnership, Trading_Trust,  B, I, D, F, N, S, T, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtLocal, GovtEdu, GovtOther

sourceRegisterUniqueIdentifier.description: Entity identifier held in register for example Company Number. Not required for POST.

lastUpdatedDate.description: The last time the entity was updated

australianBusinessNumber.description: Applicable to Companies and Overseas Companies domiciled in Australia. ABN is a unique eleven digit number that identifies a business or organisation that is operating in Australia. It is not compulsory in Australia to have an ABN and not everyone is entitled to one.

addresses.description: Collection of all Addresses relevant to the NZBN

entityStatusCode.description: A code that identifies the business entity's current trading status, during formation, operation, and voluntary or involuntary winding up.  A full list is available on the API explorer website. Not required for POST.

entityName.description: The current registered name of the business entity, which may differ from its trading name(s) and historic entity names.  For sole traders the entity name is a concatenation of First, Middle and Last Names recorded in the sole trader role entry. Not required for POST.

nzbn.description: The 13 digit unique identifier of a New Zealand business entity. Not required for POST.

entityTypeCode.description: Entity type code. One of LTD, ULTD, COOP, ASIC, NON_ASIC, Sole_Trader, Partnership, Trading_Trust, B, I, D, F, N, S, T, Y, Z, GovtCentral, GovtLocal, GovtEdu, GovtOther

entityTypeDescription.description: One of NZ Limited Company, NZ Unlimited Company, NZ Co-operative Company, Overseas ASIC Company, Overseas Non-ASIC Company, Sole Trader, Partnership, Trust, Building Society, Incorporated Society, Credit Union , Friendly Society, Industrial & Provident Society, Special Body, Charitable Trust, Limited Partnership (NZ), Limited Partnership (Overseas), Central Government, Local Government, Education, Other Public Entity

entityStatusDescription.description: The description of the business entity's trading status, e.g. showing registered or in voluntary or involuntary winding up. Not required for POST.

EntityName.title: EntityName
EntityName.description: The current and historic registered names used by the business entity. For POST /entities, this is required for all entity types (Partnership, Trust) except for Sole Trader. startDate also mandatory in this case.

startDate.description: The date this registered name was used from.

endDate.description: The date this registered name was used until.

TradingArea.title: TradingArea
TradingArea.description: The current or historical area a business operates

tradingArea.description: One of All of New Zealand, North Island, South Island, Chatham Islands Territory, All Northland Region, Far North District, Whangarei District, Kaipara District, Auckland, All Waikato Region, Thames-Coromandel District, Hauraki District, Waikato District, Matamata-Piako District, Hamilton City, Waipa District, Otorohanga District, South Waikato District, Waitomo District, Taupo District, All Bay of Plenty Region, Western Bay of Plenty District, Tauranga City, Rotorua District, Whakatane District, Kawerau District, Opotiki District, Gisborne District, All Hawke's Bay Region, Wairoa District, Hastings District, Napier City, Central Hawke's Bay District, All Taranaki Region, New Plymouth District, Stratford District, South Taranaki District, All Manawatu-Wanganui Region, Ruapehu District, Whanganui District, Rangitikei District, Manawatu District, Palmerston North City, Tararua District, Horowhenua District, All Wellington Region, Kapiti Coast District, Porirua City, Upper Hutt City, Lower Hutt City, Wellington City, Masterton District, Carterton District, South Wairarapa District, Tasman District, Nelson City, All Marlborough Region, Marlborough District, Kaikoura District, All West Coast Region, Buller District, Grey District, Westland District, All Canterbury Region, Hurunui District, Waimakariri District, Christchurch City, Selwyn District, Ashburton District, Timaru District, Mackenzie District, Waimate District, All Otago Region, Waitaki District, Central Otago District, Queenstown-Lakes District, Dunedin City, Clutha District, All Southland Region, Southland District, Gore District, Invercargill City

startDate.description: The date this area was used from.

endDate.description: The date this area was used until.

UpdateAustralianBusinessNumberRequest.title: AustralianBusinessNumber
UpdateAustralianBusinessNumberRequest.description: An Australian Business Number (ABN) for update

UpdateAustralianBusinessNumberResponse.title: AustralianBusinessNumber
UpdateAustralianBusinessNumberResponse.description: An Australian Business Number (ABN) for update

GstNumber.title: GstNumber
GstNumber.description: A GST number associated with this NZBN

startDate.description: The date this area was used from.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record

name.description: A trading name used by this business entity

startDate.description: The date this trading name applies from.

endDate.description: The date this trading name applies to.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record

purpose.description: The purpose of this bank account Nnmber

startDate.description: The date this bank account number applies from.

supportingInformation.title: supportingInformation
supportingInformation.description: Information in the request (only) about the entity creation or update. For POST /entities, either proofOfIdentity or documents is mandatory.

documents.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of letter of authorisation.

proofOfIdentity.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of authorisation.

organisationId.description: Used in POST request to specify the organisation who assumes delegated authority over this entity, or blank if the user creating the entity gains executive or delegated authority over the entity.  If provided, authorityType must be DELEGATED.

SupportingInformation.title: supportingInformation
SupportingInformation.description: Information in the request (only) about the entity creation or update. For POST /entities, either proofOfIdentity or documents is mandatory.

documents.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of letter of authorisation.

proofOfIdentity.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of authorisation.

organisationId.description: Used in POST request to specify the organisation who assumes delegated authority over this entity, or blank if the user creating the entity gains executive or delegated authority over the entity.  If provided, authorityType must be DELEGATED.

EntityStatus.title: EntityStatus
EntityStatus.description: The current and historical codes that identify the business entity's trading status, during formation, operation, and voluntary or involuntary winding up.  A full list is in the API documentation.

startDate.description: The date this entity status code applied from.

endDate.description: The date this entity status code applied until.

EMail.title: EMail
EMail.description: The email address(es) associated with the business entity.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record

emailPurpose.description: The purpose of this email address, as a short code.  Values are Primary and Other. If Other is used, the purpose attribute will have a value.

emailPurposeDescription.description: The purpose of this email address, manually entered as required to record other addresses that the entity wishes to publish. The purpose must be unique within the entity.

startDate.description: The date this email address was entered.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record

classificationCode.description: BIC Code that is applicable to this entity's nature of work

classificationDescription.description: Description of this entity's nature of work

PrivacySettings.title: PrivacySettings
PrivacySettings.description: A series of flags that indicate whether a business entity authority has elected to make various attributes public.  Only available when an entity is retrieved by a user who is logged in and has authority over the entity.

nzbnPrivateInformation.description: True if the nzbn is to be private for this business entity.

namePrivateInformation.description: True if the name is to be private for this business entity.

tradingNamePrivateInformation.description: True if all tradingNames are be private for this business entity.  If not true all provided trading names will be seen.

businessClassificationPrivateInformation.description: True if all businessClassifications are to be private for this business entity. If not true all provided classifications will be seen.

phonePrivateInformation.description: True if all phones are to be private for this business entity.  If not true all provided phones will be seen.

emailPrivateInformation.description: True if all email addresses are to be private for this business entity.  If not true all provided email addresses will be seen.

partnersPrivateInformation.description: True if all partners are to be private for this business entity.  If not true all provided values will be seen.

trusteesPrivateInformation.description: True if the trustees is to be private for this business entity.

publicSuggestChangesYn.description: True if the authority of the entity permits public submissions of changes to primary business data.

abnPrivateInformation.description: True if the ABN is to be private for this business entity.

gstNumberPrivateInformation.description: True if the GST NUmber is to be private for this business entity.

paymentBankAccountNumbersPrivateInformat.description: True if the payment bank account numbers are to be private for this business entity.

registeredAddressPrivateInformation.description: True if the registeredAddress is to be private for this business entity.

postalAddressPrivateInformation.description: True if the postalAddress is to be private for this business entity.

serviceAddressPrivateInformation.description: True if the service address is to be private for this business entity.

invoiceAddressPrivateInformation.description: True if all invoiceaddress is to be private for this business entity.

deliveryAddressPrivateInformation.description: True if all delivery address is to be private for this business entity.

officeAddressPrivateInformation.description: True if all office address is to be private for this business entity.

businessEthnicityPrivateInformation.description: True if all business ethnicity identifier information is to be private for this business entity.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: A person or other entity that is associated with this business entity - for instance as a director, officer or partner.  Role Type depends on the role types relevant to the type of the business entity. Only Companies, Sole Traders, Partnerships and Trading Trusts will return roles.

roleType.description: The relationship between this person or entity and the business entity. Can be one of Director, Person Authorised for Service, Sole Trader, Partner, Trustee, Officer. For sole traders, there will always be a Sole Trader role which records the current First, Middle and Last Names of the person.

startDate.description: The date this relationship applies from.

endDate.description: The date this relationship applies to.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record.

RoleEntity.title: RoleEntity
RoleEntity.description: The NZBN and name of the business entity role holder.  NZBN is currently not populated.

links.description: Links to the address type specific API calls - using addressType query parameter

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record.

startDate.description: The date this address applies from. May be future dated

endDate.description: The date this address applies to. Will be blank for current addresses.  We consider the latest address to be the current one, even if it is future dated

postCode.description: A New Zealand or overseas postcode or zip code.

countryCode.description: ISO 2-character country code, eg NZ, GB, AU.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record

phonePurpose.description: The purpose of this phone number is as a short code.  Values are Phone, Mobile and Other

phonePurposeDescription.description: The purpose of this phone number as text description.  Only populated if phonePurpose is Other

startDate.description: The date this phone number applies from.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A code to allow updating of this record.

url.description: The address of a website related to this business entity.

startDate.description: The date this website applies from.

Metadata.title: Metadata
Metadata.description: data on a document or other identifying material (such as a letter of authorisation, passport or IRD Number). Only the attributes relevant to information shown on the document should be entered.

metadataId.description: Identifier of the metadata object.  Will be blank in requests.

metadataType.description:
One of the following:
* LETTER_OF_AUTH - Letter of Authorisation
* DRIVERS_LICENCE - Drivers Licence
* PASSPORT - Passport
* IRD_NUMBER - IRD Number 
* OTHER – other document to support request/claim
metadataType is not an enum, as these type codes will be added to over time.  For Sole Traders, Partnerships and Trusts – a metadata object with metadataType = IRD_NUMBER is required.

Name.description: The person or business entity name, exactly as shown on the document

DateOfBirth.description: The person's date of birth, exactly as shown on the document

Number.description: The document number (eg passport number or Drivers Licence number)

Version.description: The document version (specifically for Drivers Licence)

ExpiryDate.description: the document expiry date, exactly as shown on the document

Document.title: Document
Document.description: Reference to a file containing a scanned document, that was already uploaded using POST /documents .

documentId.description: the identifier for this document, returned when uploaded using POST /documents.  Document must have been uploaded previously.

documentType.description: A code to identify what the document contains (eg drivers licence, trust deed etc).

Company.title: Company
Company.description: Public information about a Company entity, that is in addition to Primary Business data.

extensiveShareholding.description: Companies with extensive shareholding are either listed on the stock exchange or have more than around 20 shareholdings. Only the largest share parcels are returned. To obtain a full list of shareholders please contact the company directly.

australianCompanyNumber.description: Applicable to Companies and Overseas Companies domiciled in Australia. The ACN is a unique nine-digit number issued by the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) as an identifier to every Australian company registered under the Corporations Act 2001.

EntitySearchResults.title: EntitySearchResults
EntitySearchResults.description: a cut-down entity record with sufficient information to populate a results grid. Use the link in the entity attribute to GET the full entity object.  Attribute definitions are the same as the full entity attributes.

NzbnChange.description: A record containing the changes to a given NZBN at a given time

nzbn.description: The 13 digit unique identifier of a New Zealand business entity.

entityName.description: The current registered name of the business entity, which may differ from its trading name(s) and historic entity names. For sole traders the entity name is a concatenation of First, Middle and Last Names recorded in the sole trader role entry.

changeDateTime.description: The date and time when this change occurred.

items.description: The collection of changes in this change notice

ChangeEvent.description: An instance of change to a data item for a NZBN.

changeEventType.description: Indicates the changeEventType the NZBN change is classified by. For example 'NEW', 'ADDRESSES_INVOICE'.

newValue.description: Provides the value the attribute was set to by the change.

Filing.title: Filing
Filing.description: a transaction or document posting that describes changes made to this entity

archived.description: True if this filing has been archived

filingCode.description: A code identifying the business purpose of this filing.  Refer API documentation for the list of filings.

filingCodeDescription.description: A description of the business purpose of this filing.

registrationDate.description: The date/time this filing was actioned

attachments.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of letter of authorisation.

Watchlist.title: Watchlist
Watchlist.description: A set of entities that a user or an organisation wishes to be notified about if they change. Currently, this notification is via a digest email to a collection of email addresses on a set period.

userId.description: optional for create, is always the current user's UserId.

organisationId.description: Optional, If blank this is a personal watchlist. If completed this is an organisation’s watchlist and can be managed by any administrator of this organisation.  If entered; must be a valid Organisation Id for the NZBN system and one that the user is a member of.

changeEventTypes.description:
One or more comma-separated values from the allowable list of change event types, as specified by the request.  Controls what changes will be notified in respect to the specified NZBNs.  To be notified of new entities use the change event type NEW
ALL,
NEW,
ENTITY,
ADDRESSES_REGISTERED,
ADDRESSES_OFFICE,
ADDRESSES_POSTAL,
ADDRESSES_RECORDS,
ADDRESSES_SHAREREGISTER,
ADDRESSES_INVOICE,
ADDRESSES_DELIVERY,
ADDRESSES_SERVICE,
COMPANYDETAILS_FRAFILINGMONTH,
COMPANYDETAILS_ARFILINGMONTH,
COMPANYDETAILS_CONSTITUTIONFILED,
COMPANYDETAILS_COUNTRYOFORIGIN,
COMPANYDETAILS_NZSXCODE,
COMPANYDETAILS_ACNNUMBER,
COMPANYDETAILS_ULTIMATEHOLDINGCOMPANY,
COMPANYDETAILS_SHAREHOLDING,
COMPANYDETAILS_INSOLVENCYDETAILS,
COMPANYDETAILS_FILINGS, 
COMPANYDETAILS_REMOVALCOMMENCED,  
COMPANYDETAILS_ANNUALRETURNS,
ROLES_DIRECTOR,
ROLES_SOLETRADER,
ROLES_TRUSTEE_INDIVIDUAL,
ROLES_PARTNER_INDIVIDUAL,
ROLES_TRUSTEE_OTHER,
ROLES_PARTNER_OTHER,
ROLES_PARTNER_GENERAL_PARTNER,
ROLES_PERSONAUTHORISEDFORSERVICE,
PRIVACYSETTINGS,
TRADINGNAMES,
WEBSITES,
PHONENUMBERS,
EMAILADDRESSES,
GSTNUMBER,
TRADINGAREAS,
AUSTRALIANBUSINESSNUMBER,
INDUSTRYCLASSIFICATIONS

authorizationToken.description: The remote authorization method for Push Notifications. Token (GUID) or username/password combination that can be passed in an Authorization header.

adminEmailAddress.description: Mandatory where channel = PUSH.  The email address to which an email will be sent when the push retry process has reached maximum retries, or when there is a persistent error sending notifications. The purpose of the email is to advise an administrator (on behalf of the API Consumer) that there is a push endpoint exception at the customer end, or an email send exception for the standard email notifications. Note -  In event of persistent notification exceptions, MBIE will place an End Date on the watchlist effectively halting notifications.  The customer can update the End Date to a null or future date to re-start notifications using the Update watch-list use case when they are confident that they can receive notifications again.

watchlistEmailAddresses.description: Mandatory if channel = "EMAIL" otherwise, if Channel = "PUSH", not used.  One or more, comma-separated, email addresses can be entered to which watchlist notifications will be sent.

lastSuccessfulChangeNoticeId.description: The unique identifier for the last successful change notice sent for the watchlist.  Not populated until a change notice has been sent. Note -  1.  Each time a change notice is sent to the watchlist owner AND the success message is received by the NZBN services, the ID will be updated in the watchlist record. 2.  Only will be populated where channel = "PUSH".

suspended.description: Indicates whether a watchlist has been suspended due to delivery failures (for channel = PUSH notifications).

links.description: Links to the watchlist-specific API calls

nzbns.description: A list of NZBNs that the watchlist owner is interested in.  Notifications will be sent where changes to the NZBNs occur that match the other specified watch parameters.
A list of NZBNs that the watchlist owner is interested in.  Notifications will be sent where changes to the NZBNs occur that match the other specified watch parameters.

links.description: Links to the watchlist-specific API calls
Links to the watchlist-specific API calls

Authority.title: Authority
Authority.description: A specific authorisation - for a user or an organisation, over an NZBN entity

authorityId.description: the identifier for this authority resource. Blank for POST.

nzbn.description: the entity this authority is for.  Not required in a POST if the IR number is supplied (in supporting information) and entity type is Sole Trader, Partnership or Trust.

entityName.description: the name of the entity this authority is for (for populating results grids in responses).  Ignored in requests.

entityStatusCode.description: The code that identifies the business entity's current trading status.  A full list is available on the API explorer website. Ignored in requests.

entityTypeCode.description: the type of entity this authority is for (for populating results grids).  Ignored in requests.

userId.description: the user that holds (or is requesting/claiming/being granted) this authority (if a personal authority)

organisationId.description: the organisation that holds (or is requesting/claiming/being granted) this authority (if an organisational authority)

partyName.description: User name or organisation name, depending on whether authority is an individual or an organisation

supportingInformation.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of authorisation.

documents.description: Used in POST or PUT request.  Information associated with this creation or update, such as proof of identity or proof of letter of authorisation.

reason.description: Textual notes about why the last status change was made. Mandatory if authorityStatus is REJECTED. Must be between 10 and 500 chars. N/A for other statuses.

comment.description: Textual notes about this authority. Mandatory if authorityStatus is REJECTED or REVOKED. Must be between 10 and 500 chars. N/A for other statuses.

status.description: the user's status. Can be one of noProfile, active. Only users with status 'active' may perform API operations. If status is noProfile, you must use onboard this user and use PUT /users/{userId} to populate a user's profile. Thsi will change their status from noProfile to active.

Organisation.title: Organisation
Organisation.description: A group of users that belongs to an organisation such as an accounting firm or bookkeepers. The Organisation has delegated authority over entities, that applies to all members of the organisation.

organisationUsers.description: Links to this organisations organisationUser records (organisationUser search)

authorities.description: Links to the authorities that this organisation holds (authorities search)

OrganisationUser.title: OrganisationUser
OrganisationUser.description: A stub user that represents a member of an organisation.  If pending it may not be associated with a true user.

organisationUserId.description: The OrganisationUser's ID.  Ignored on Create.

organisationId.description: The organisation this organisationuser belongs to.  Ignored in request, on create and update.

firstName.description: Pending users - attribute entered by organisation admin. Active users - attribute from User resource.

middleNames.description: Pending users - attribute entered by organisation admin. Active users - attribute from User resource.

lastName.description: Pending users - attribute entered by organisation admin. Active users - attribute from User resource.

fullName.description: Pending users - attribute entered by organisation admin. Active users - attribute from User resource.

AuthorityStatus.title: AuthorityStatus
AuthorityStatus.description: The Authority Status. All authorities are retained, even when disabled.  Only authorityId, authorityStatus and reason are used in a PUT request; all other attributes are ignored.

AddressType.title: AddressType
AddressType.description: One of [postal address, registered address, address for service, office address, delivery address, invoice address, records address, shareholder address.

ApprovalType.title: ApprovalType
ApprovalType.description:
POST requests only - the means of approving the request for authority.
* REGISTRAR_LETTER - for requests on behalf of an org which is NOT a professional authority for the Registrar
* REGISTRAR_ID_PROOF – for individual requests for the Registrar
* USER – for both individual and org requests from Director with executive authority
* PROFESSIONAL_AUTHORITY – for requests on behalf of an org which is  a professional authority

AuthorityType.title: AuthorityType
AuthorityType.description: Used in POST request to specify authority granted to user creating the entity.  Executive infers that a Director (or equivalent) is creating the entity themselves; Delegated infers that another party is creating the entity i.e. a bookkeeper, accountant etc.

Role1.title: Role1
Role1.description: the user's role within the organisation - administrator or member

Status.title: Status
Status.description: The organisationuser's status - whether active or not. Not editable - new OrganisationUsers are created with a status of INACTIVE.

Wildcard.title: Wildcard
Wildcard.description: A wildcard that specifies a group of entity types that the watchlist owner is interested in.  Valid values are "All", or a list/combination of one or more of the following "Unincorporated", "Public sector", "Companies", "Incorporated". All – means watch all NZBN’s – get notifications for all NZBN’s on the register •  Unincorporated – Watch all unincorporated entities1; Sole traders, partnerships, trusts, other unincorporated entities (E.g. Scouts, FMG, Institute of accountants, Charities that have registered on the NZBN) •  Public Sector – watch all public sector organisations1 – Central Govt, Local Govt, Govt Education, Govt Other. •  Companies – watch all NZ Company types on the NZ Companies register (LTD, ULTD, ASIC, NON_ASIC, COOP) 1 •  Incorporated – Watch all incorporated entities1 – Companies, Limited Partnerships – NZ and overseas, Charitable Trusts, Credit Unions, Friendly Societies, Incorporated Societies, Industrial and Provident Societies, Other incorporated entities .

BusinessEthnicityIdentifier.title: Business Ethnicity Identifier
BusinessEthnicityIdentifier.description: Describes how a business identifies ethnically in one or more ways

identifyingFactors.description: The collection of identifying factors of this ethnicity

IdentifyingFactor.title: Identifying Factor
IdentifyingFactor.description: The specific factor of a business that carries the ethnic identity

identifyingFactorOtherDescription.description: Only complete the field if OTHER_PLEASE_SPECIFY has been chosen as the identifyingFactor

Factor.title: Factor
Factor.description: The list of possible business factors that ethnic identity can be associated with

Ethnicity.title: Ethnicity
Ethnicity.description: This describes the ethnicity the business identifies as. Initially only MAORI to be recorded

RequestIdParameter.name: api-business-govt-nz-Request-Id
RequestIdParameter.description: Request id. Provide a UUID that is unique to this request.  This header is not required.

NoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
NoneMatchParameter.description: If-None-Match. Takes an ETag - optional for GET

MatchParameter.name: If-Match
MatchParameter.description: If-Match. Takes an ETag - required for PUT or DELETE

400.description: Request failed validation. Appropriate headers not provided or request did not validate or is not supported.

401.description: Permission Denied, need to be authenticated to access or modify this resource.

403.description: Permission Denied, need to be authorised to access or modify this resource.

412.description: Concurrency headers could be be validated. Neither If-None-Match or If-Modified-Since could be validated

tags.name: Entities
tags.description: Search for and view NZBN Entities
